channel.title: A great idea!
channel.description: ok i bielive this will work but i will need someone to help me. go to wherever you placed moparscape (not the shortcut) and click on hybridscape. the click on charecters. there will be notepads for all the charecters you have loged in on moparscape for that cp. wana show off your moparscape account. upload it and let soemone download it. make sure when u download it u put it in the right folder. to get onto there account, click on the notepad. the title should be the username of it. then the password for the account is in the noepad near de begining. from there you can also change stats and lots of other things. so i need a volonteer to see if this works. if you want to be my olinteer post in this thread. Thx, coolshark 8

item.title: A great idea!
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

coolshark 88:

what do u mean spam?

Spam as in posted in wrong section, and since there is no section for this, then it is posted in the completely wrong forums… This does not HELP servers in any way… And if you do not know why I emphasized HELP, then take a look at the section you are in…

[quote=“JAVA OWNS C++, post:9, topic:109397”]oh yay, lets show off my skills

::pickup 0995 2147000000

hey look im rich[/quote]

Actually, it’d be

::pickup 0995 2147483647
:P

Read full topic

item.title: A great idea!
item.dc:creator: @coolshark_88 coolshark 88
item.description:
@coolshark_88 wrote:

ok i bielive this will work but i will need someone to help me. go to wherever you placed moparscape (not the shortcut) and click on hybridscape. the click on charecters. there will be notepads for all the charecters you have loged in on moparscape for that cp. wana show off your moparscape account. upload it and let soemone download it. make sure when u download it u put it in the right folder. to get onto there account, click on the notepad. the title should be the username of it. then the password for the account is in the noepad near de begining. from there you can also change stats and lots of other things. so i need a volonteer to see if this works. if you want to be my olinteer post in this thread.
Thx,
coolshark 8

Read full topic
